text: thumma qaffayna ʿala atharihim birusulina waqaffayna biʿisa ib'ni maryama waataynahu l-injila wajaʿalna fi qulubi alladhina ittabaʿuhu rafatan warahmatan warahbaniyyatan ib'tadaʿuha ma katabnaha ʿalayhim illa ib'tighaa rid'wani l-lahi fama raʿawha haqqa riʿayatiha faatayna alladhina amanu min'hum ajrahum wakathirun min'hum fasiquna
